name: Super Spooky Subgame Spectacular
description:
Super Spooky Subgame Spectacular will bring you on a thrilling journey! This hair-raising Halloween extravaganza offers an array of ghoulishly fun subgames, including Find the Difference challenges that'll keep you on the edge of your seat, spine-chilling Jigsaw puzzles to piece together, and eerie Paint sessions to create your own spooky masterpieces. Engage your mind with creepy Crossword mysteries to solve, test your memory with ghostly pairs in the Memory game, and put your wordplay skills to the test with haunting Word Guess challenges.



But that's not all! With over 20 types of subgames, get ready to test your wits and nerve with a host of chilling challenges.

Feature

  • Pick and play any level!
  • Beautiful soundtrack!
  • Over 20 types of subgames!
  • Make gameplay easier with the Hint funtion!
  • Super spooky fun!

Collector's Edition

  • 23 extra levels
  • Music Player
  • Wallpapers

Prepare for a ghostly good time with a myriad of other thrilling surprises that await in this immersive Halloween experience. Embrace the frightful fun, as you explore and conquer the Super Spooky Subgame Spectacular!
